word:
God help you, my brother, to be a true Christian, consistent today, consistent tomorrow, always solid in speech, with no frivolity, no lifeless or trifling words. He is reaching up unto Christ, and does not fall into spiritual declension. "Walk as wise men, not as fools." My brother, seek to be a well built Christian, having a character symmetrical in all its parts. Be always inquiring. "Is my name written there, on the books bright and fair?" 


                                   -280-
